original_title: グラビアアイドルの彼女が親父プロデューサーに寝取られ種付けプレスされていた。 深田えいみ
overview: Gravure idol "Eimi Fukada". I manage her, and the producer of the TV station told me to drop the regular program. She managed to ask her to throw her in a row, and the producer asked her to talk about her seriousness alone. I believed in her and sent her out.
title: A gravure idol was taken by her father producer and was seeded and pressed.
